original_text: And Jesus, when he was baptized, went up straightway out of the water: and, lo, the heavens were opened unto him, and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove, and lighting upon him:
korean_text: 예수께서 세례를 받으시고 곧 물에서 올라오실새 하늘이 열리고 하나님의 성령이 비둘기 같이 내려 자기 위에 임하심을 보시더니

sentences.original_text: And Jesus, when he was baptized
went up straightway out of the water:
and, lo, the heavens were opened unto him,
and he saw the Spirit of God descending
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 하나님의 영이 내려오시는 것을 보았으니

sentences.original_text: like a dove, and lighting upon him:
